mapper.insert: insert into notice(userNo, noticeTitle, noticeContent, regDate) values(#{userNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, now());
mapper.select: select n.noticeNo as noticeNo, n.noticeTitle as noticeTitle, u.userNickname as userNickname, date_format(n.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDate from notice as n join user as u where n.userNo = u.userNo order by n.noticeNo Desc;
